name: The Busted Unfinished Version of Bomb Boy
name_original: The Busted Unfinished Version of Bomb Boy
description:
This is a prototype/concept/test to see if the game engine I used is good (it is) and is planned to be a fully made and released game with actual graphics, music, sound, and so much fun to be had.

The free version doesn't let me do as much as I had hoped, but I will buy the full version as soon as my paycheck rolls in.

The game itself is a co-op puzzle platformer where you must rely on each other to get both of you to the end. It's currently played locally on the same computer, one player using wasd and the other using arrow keys, but online support will be added in the full version, whenever that is made.

There only two levels and the second doesn't quite work like I had hoped but both are playable and completable puzzles.

There are probably bugs, definitely bugs, but that's kinda the joke of this game as it is highly unfinished.
